document.title: Other Project Items
document.paragraph:
The Other Project Items folder in an EiffelEnvision ../project.xmlProject is designed to store arbitrary project related items, that are not specific to the project itself.
in_this_section2In This Sectionother_project_items.xmlOther Project Items Folder An explanation of the Other Project Items folder and its function within an EiffelEnvision project. context_menu.xmlOther Project Items Context Menu The Other Project Items folder context menu. virtual_folders.xmlVirtual Folders A brief overview of the Virtual Folder found under Other Project Items. file_items.xmlGeneric File Items A overview of the generic file items found under Other Project Items. also_see2Related SectionsSee Also:../index.xmlEiffelEnvision Projectsms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog.htmSolution Explorerms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxconFolder-BasedReference-BasedProjects.htmItem Management in Projects../../configuring/adding_items/adding_existings_items.xmlAdding Existing Items../../configuring/adding_items/adding_folders.xmlAdding New Folders
